metadata.title: CVE-2016-2429 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libFLAC/stream_decoder.c in mediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.xbefore 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-05-01 does notprevent free operations on uninitialized memory, which allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (heapmemory corruption) via a crafted media file, aka internal bug 27211885.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
